content.raw:
I just applied the changes to the include folder to `ign-physics1` and built against the ign-plugin branch, and it didn't have any compilation problems. I also ran it through the abi checker with `-quick` (otherwise it runs out of memory), and it didn't have any complaints either.

I think it would be safe to rebase this and target it to `ign-physics1`
content.html:
I just applied the changes to the include folder to ign-physics1 and built against the ign-plugin branch, and it didn't have any compilation problems. I also ran it through the abi checker with -quick (otherwise it runs out of memory), and it didn't have any complaints either.

I think it would be safe to rebase this and target it to ign-physics1
